It was a sweltering summer evening in the bustling city of Mumbai, India. The sun had just dipped below the horizon, casting an eerie glow on the streets. You, a renowned detective, are pacing back and forth in your small yet charming office, waiting for the evening postman. As he arrives, you eagerly snatch the letter he hands over with a nondescript envelope.

Upon opening the letter, you find a cryptic message: "Along the path of reflecting waters ticks the hand of time, behind the whispers of ancient wisdom, fate lies within the most sacred of shrines."

Suddenly, your mobile phone buzzes, breaking your concentration. It's a message from your trusted friend and informant, Ravi. "Heard you're needed at the Elephanta Caves. A priceless artifact has been stolen. Authorities are clueless. Better get there!"

With your heart pounding, you realize that you hardly have any time to waste. To uncover the mystery and save the artifact, you must choose your next course of action.

What would you like to do?

1. Visit the scene of the crime at Elephanta Caves as soon as possible.
2. Analyze the cryptic message and try to deduce some clues.
3. Contact the authorities to get more information on the disappearance.
4. Consult Ravi to seek his insight on the situation.
